name: Low-Poly Zombies
description:
Welcome to LOW POLY ZOMBIES!

Low Poly Zombies is a third person, round based, survival shooter. A low-poly tribute to the classic zombies games you may have played consisting of gun upgrades, fun power-ups and some fairly scary bosses to fight! 

Synty Town has been taken over by zombies! Fight with slow, fast, crawling, giant, explosive zombies to survive as long as you can! Collect points and buy new weapons, switching between your purchased weapons freely at the gun shop!

The Low Poly Zombies bosses take the game to another level, throwing explosives or trying to stomp you out are 2 of the many ways they will try to kill you, will they get what they want?

How long can you survive?
